Conversations/Bank/Elsie/Museum Lines/cr: That =Crystal Rose= at the museum is romantic, isn't it? Gazing at it fills me with a sweet feeling of nostalgia.
Conversations/Bank/Elsie/Museum Lines/fe: There are still places in Aldaria where lovers propose with feather pendants. I'm sure you can guess how I know!
There's an =Alda Feather Pendant= in the Alda section of the museum. I recognized its purpose immediately.
